description.S1: The BOLT-52 is in an abandoned building north of Stellar Bay

blurb.B1: Head out into Monarch Wilderness and make your way to the objective building by a large bridge.
blurb.B2: There's a Raptidon Behemoth here, and you can loot an Iconoclast corpse for ARMS Building Key and Leaded Armor.

description.S1: The BOLT-52 is in a locked closet.
description.S2: Find a way inside and retrieve it.

blurb.B1: Huxley's partner had the key to the door, but he was probably killed by raptidons.
blurb.B2: You might find the key on his body, or in a raptidon's stomach.
blurb.B3: You found the key to the closet.
blurb.B4: You can also ask Huxley to open the door from inside, it takes Perception, or Engineering (35), Intimidate (55) or Persuade (55).
blurb.B5: The door will open and Huxley will come outand you'll get Iconoclasts reputation.
blurb.B6: You can ask her for a reward, and obtain some Iconoclast reputation.
blurb.B7: Inside the room, loot Mag-Pick, Ammo and Bit Cartridge and the BOLT-52 Cartridge.

dialog.speaker: HuxleyIntercom (Female)
dialog.utterance: Hello? Hellooooooo? I hear boots out there! Wait, can rapts wear boots?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Hello! Who's in there?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I don't think they've figured that out yet. Who are you?

dialog.speaker: HuxleyIntercom (Female)
dialog.utterance: Oh, thank the Eternal. I'm Huxley. Hux if you're lazy. I'm stuck.

dialog.speaker: HuxleyIntercom (Female)
dialog.utterance: My friends and I were scavenging here and a mantiqueen showed up. Then raptidons. It was a void-blasted mess.

dialog.speaker: HuxleyIntercom (Female)
dialog.utterance: I ran in here and um... now the door's locked. Little help?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You got... locked in? How?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Well, I need to get in that room.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I need to get in that room, but maybe I'll let you starve first.

dialog.speaker: HuxleyIntercom (Female)
dialog.utterance: It's easier than it sounds, all right? Next time you get chased by raptidons you let me know the rationality of your decisions!

dialog.speaker: HuxleyIntercom (Female)
dialog.utterance: Whew. Thanks, mister.

dialog.speaker: HuxleyIntercom (Female)
dialog.utterance: My buddy had a key, but I ain't heard him in a while. He locked me in here and took off. Probably got munched.

dialog.speaker: HuxleyIntercom (Female)
dialog.utterance: So look for a dead guy, I guess. Or a rapt. Maybe it's in a rapt belly. Gross.

dialog.speaker: HuxleyIntercom (Female)
dialog.utterance: Get me outta here!

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Seeing as you're trapped, you might as well answer a few things for me.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: There must be a way to open it from the inside.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'll take a look around.

dialog.speaker: HuxleyIntercom (Female)
dialog.utterance: Sure. Beats not answering questions.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Who are you?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: So... get locked in closets often?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Right. Back to the door.

dialog.speaker: HuxleyIntercom (Female)
dialog.utterance: Huxley. I'm an Iconoclast runner. The Iconoclast runner. Fastest we've got! Ain't a raptidon on this void-forsaken hellhole that can catch me!

dialog.speaker: HuxleyIntercom (Female)
dialog.utterance: I'm, uh... I'm... whew. Sorry. Put me in a tiny room like this and I'm liable to flip. Not keen on tight spaces, you know?

dialog.speaker: HuxleyIntercom (Female)
dialog.utterance: My buddy locked me in here! I told you that! It was for my safekeeping, on account of raptidons wanting to munch on my head.

dialog.speaker: HuxleyIntercom (Female)
dialog.utterance: But... I mean... okay, yes. Fine. I get myself into sticky situations. It's just part of the life, all right? Sometimes you gotta hide in a trash can so's you don't get eaten by monsters.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Wait really? I wasn't serious.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: That's disgusting. I'd rather be eaten.

dialog.speaker: HuxleyIntercom (Female)
dialog.utterance: Oh, uh, haha, neither was I. Who'd hide in a trash can? Gross.

dialog.speaker: HuxleyIntercom (Female)
dialog.utterance: Suit yourself, mister.

dialog.speaker: HuxleyIntercom (Female)
dialog.utterance: What do you mean? It's locked.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Fine, let's try something else.

dialog.speaker: HuxleyIntercom (Female)
dialog.utterance: Rude! I'll have you know I can go for whole days without a snack!

dialog.speaker: HuxleyIntercom (Female)
dialog.utterance: I'll be here if you change your mind. On account of I can't do anything else.
